General.Name: Eidesvik Offshore ASA
General.Description: Eidesvik Offshore ASA operates as a shipping company in Norway. It operates through Supply, Subsea/Off shore Wind, Seismic, and Other segments. The company delivers shipping services to customers who produce seismic data; subsea inspection, maintenance, repair, and construction services for subsea work in the oil industry. It operates 8 large supply vessels and fleet of 16 vessels related to subsea/wind. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bømlo, Norway. Eidesvik Offshore ASA operates as a subsidiary of Eidesvik Invest AS.
